column5: Our house is close to downtown as well as Alamo Drafthouse, Ramen Tatsu-ya, Din Ho Chinese BBQ, Bartlett's, Hanabi Sushi, Top Golf, The Domain restaurants & shopping, Hop Doddy and Pinballz old school arcade. Youâ€™ll love our place because we're friendly, the back yard is awesome, the neighborhood is quiet, and you're a 10 minute drive to downtown. There's also a bus station walking distance as well.
